metadata.description: You think you know Lucas Bishop- former cop, renegade X-Man-refuses to rest until he's killed the so-called "mutant messiah"? Jump 50 years into the future, when his parents barely escaped a nuclear holocaust, only to land in the most brutal "mutant relocation" camp in the world. There, a young Bishop first heard the horror stories about the green-eyed monster that ushered in the downfall of mutantkind, and swore vengeance- embarking on a life-long, time-hopping mission.
metadata.name: X-Men: The Lives and Times of Lucas Bishop
